347,122|327,142|307,142|292,127|258,130|247,141|207,141|187,140|171,140|135,151|107,191|118,215|292,218|291,225|327,225|347,226|387,226|407,227|467,227|487,228|507,228|527,248|547,228|567,229|607,229|627,230|687,230|707,231|767,231|787,232|847,232|867,233|907,233|927,234|987,234|1007,235|1067,235|1087,236|1127,236|1147,237|1207,237|1227,238|1287,238|1307,239|1367,239|1387,240|1427,240|1447,241|1507,241|1527,242|1587,242|1607,243|1647,243|1667,244|1727,244|1747,245|1793,245|1796,226|1980,222|1985,180|1887,161|1867,161|1862,156|1836,151|1827,160|1767,160|1754,146|1741,145|1727,159|1687,159|1667,158|1650,141|1606,139|1587,158|1567,157|1507,157|1487,156|1447,156|1427,136|1407,135|1387,135|1367,155|1347,155|1327,154|1267,154|1247,153|1187,153|1167,152|1147,132|1107,132|1087,151|1027,151|1007,150|947,150|927,149|847,149|827,148|767,148|747,147|687,147|667,146|607,146|587,145|527,145|507,144|447,144|427,143|407,123|367,123|347,122 302-01|302.|Letters|Orders|and|Instructions.|December|1755.
